mapper.insert: insert into Mento(UserID, Introduction, Ability, CareerCertification, UnivCertification, IssueCertification) values (#{UserID}, #{Introduction}, #{Ability}, #{CareerUrl}, #{UnivUrl}, #{IssueUrl})
insert into Mentoring(MentoID, Title, Content, Price, Thumbnail, file_urls) values (#{MentoID}, #{Title}, #{contents}, #{Price}, #{Thumbnailurl}, #{fileurls})
